messages.title: Your vote: it's Theresa May or Jeremy Corbyn
messages.content: Only Theresa May and the Conservatives can deliver Brexit. Lend them your vote.

messages.title: Lend your vote to Theresa May and her local candidate, Dr Adam Sykes
messages.content: This election matters more than most. Your choice in this election is between a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, or strong and stable leadership with Theresa May and her team.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Adam will work with Theresa May to deliver the best deal for Wirral and the rest of the UK as we leave the EU
Adam supports the NHS and will fight for a fairer share locally of the extra £34 billion Conservative investment.
Ex-Grammar School pupil Adam supports getting fair funding for schools, and backing the Grammar Schools.
Will vote for lower taxes for local working people and their families
Adam supports our Armed Forces and veterans and voted to back the UK.

mentions.candidate: Local campaigner, Dr Adam Sykes, launches his campaign in Bromborough to be your new MP
mentions.tacticalSituation: Wirral South is a target seat for Jeremy Corbyn.

issues.brexitEurope: Adam will work with Theresa May to deliver the best deal for Wirral and the rest of the UK as we leave the EU.
issues.defence: Adam supports our Armed Forces and veterans and voted to back the UK.
issues.education: Ex-Grammar School pupil Adam supports getting fair funding for schools and backing the Grammar Schools.
issues.environment: Adam is working to produce a local plan to protect our Green Belt.
issues.health: Adam supports the NHS and will fight for a fairer share locally of the extra £34 billion Conservative investment.

community.content: Adam is working to produce a local plan to protect our Green Belt.

leaflet.personalStatement: From Wirral, for Wirral - the new Conservative candidate for Wirral South, Dr Adam Sykes writes: The choice for residents couldn't be clearer this time; vote for me, a local Conservative candidate determined to fight for Wirral, or get Jeremy Corbyn's candidate voted into Downing Street.

endorsements.endorsement: I’m voting for Adam Sykes, as I trust him to get the best for me locally and nationally.

quotes.text: Since the election campaign began, many people who voted Liberal Democrat at the elections have said that, this time, they will vote for local campaigner, Dr Adam Sykes.

images.caption: Local campaigner, Dr Adam Sykes, launches his campaign in Bromborough to be your new MP

examples: Lend your vote to Theresa May and her local candidate, Dr Adam Sykes
Only Theresa May and the Conservatives can deliver Brexit.
Lend your vote to Theresa May and her local candidate, Dr Adam Sykes
Only Theresa May and the Conservatives can deliver Brexit.
Adam is working to produce a local plan to protect our Green Belt.
Local campaigner, Dr Adam Sykes, launches his campaign in Bromborough to be your new MP
Adam supports the NHS and will fight for a fairer share locally of the extra £34 billion Conservative investment.
Adam will work with Theresa May to deliver the best deal for Wirral and the rest of the UK as we leave the EU.

personalStories.story: Adam, who is a governor of local schools, said, "These are the same Liberal Democrat voters who tactically voted Labour in 2015 but have now switched their support to me."

examples: Sophie Dixon, Bebington, said: I’m voting for Adam Sykes, as I trust him to get the best for me locally and nationally.
Mike Gibbs, NHS worker, said: Jeremy Corbyn seemed to want to make promises he has no intention of keeping.
The Town hall’s failure to produce a local plan to protect our Green Belt is allowing developers to go for the most valuable sites around Wirral.
Jeremy Corbyn has refused to rule out holding a second referendum on Brexit.
A vote for Labour in Wirral South is a vote to put Jeremy Corbyn into Downing Street.
Jeremy Corbyn seemed to want to make promises he has no intention of keeping.
Since Theresa May’s Plan for Britain after we leave the EU, the economy has grown.

nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Set up his own computer software business that now employs six local people.
nonPolicyAttributes.education: Governor of Thornton Hough Primary School and Thingwall Primary School.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: Married to Kirsty, with two young children.

examples: New Conservative candidate for Wirral South, Dr Adam Sykes writes: The choice for residents couldn't be clearer this time; vote for me, a local Conservative candidate determined to fight for Wirral.
